participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending my free time mountain biking, as it is a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I have a pet dog named Sunshine who loves to play in my sunflower field.
I like to go to car shows and corvette forums online to learn more about my car and see what other people are doing with theirs.
I like to keep my personal life private.
I am not close with my family and I prefer to spend time alone.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
I'm comfortable with my own company and don't need music to keep me entertained.
i like katy perry as a musician.
i pray to god for my family every morning.
I am a single, asthmatic web designer.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great, thanks! I'm just hanging out with my dog Sunshine, who loves to play in my sunflower field.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love sunflowers. I have a few plants in my garden.
That's great! I have a lot of sunflowers, too. I love the way they look and they smell so good.
Do you like to go mountain biking?
I do! It's a great way to get exercise and enjoy the outdoors. I have a few favorite trails that I like to ride.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been mountain biking before, but it sounds like something I would enjoy.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a great way to get outside and explore.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
